DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate 24 month prospective follow - everyday clinical practice - resource utilization effectiveness treatment acromegalic patient Poland Somatuline Autogel 120 mg include extend injection interval .
DOC.brief_title: Study Polish Acromegalic Patients Treated With Somatuline Autogel
DOC.criteria: Adult patient acromegaly treat least three injection Somatuline Autogel 120 mg Subjects must treat acromegaly least 1 year , medical treatment prior inclusion . One year historical data must available Active participation interventional noninterventional acromegaly clinical study . Previous participation observational / postmarketing study somatostatin analogue exclusion criterion
